title: Blended Learning Course on Cardiovascular Pharmacotherapy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A blended course for practicing professionals to learn the fundamental principles and applications of cardiovascular pharmacotherapy, combining online modules with real-time activities.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the mechanisms of action and indications of major cardiovascular drugs with 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze patient cases and develop appropriate cardiovascular drug treatment plans
Learners can compare and evaluate drug selection criteria for thrombosis prevention and treatment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
